Title: Prohibits the removal of managed natural landscapes
Summary: Prohibits the removal of managed natural landscapes that are maintained within the bounds of private property.
LawCode: Ren §§1320 & 1321 to be §§1321 & 1322, amd §§1321 & 1322, add §1320, Pub Health L; amd §64, Town L; amd §17-145, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, the town law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to prohibiting the removal of managed natural landscapes
